bioconda.name: bioconductor-rtca
bioconda.summary: Open-source toolkit to analyse data from xCELLigence System (RTCA)

biotools.summary: This BioConductor package provides several unique transformation (normalization) strategies and various visualization tools for Roche xCELLigence systems.

bioschemas.name: RTCA
bioschemas.summary: This BioConductor package provides several unique transformation (normalization) strategies and various visualization tools for Roche xCELLigence systems.
